lines.text: What's your name, officer?
It's Strange, Sir.
I don't care how fucking strange it is.
No Sir, it's officer Strange.
I'll tell you what it is, Fanducci. It's a big guy in a bulletproof dog suit.

[about the Philadelphia dig]
If there's one thing older than Art, it's pornography.
I'll try and find some dirty words for you...

[as Fenrir trashes a Performance Art installation and starts eating the performer]
The trouble with this kind of Art is that you can't collect it...

[Marla has noticed a Christian icon among his antiquities]
A contradiction in my design scheme, I admit. There are no atheists in foxholes. And you are in one now!

[Fenrir towers over him]
No beast so fierce without some trace of pity?
Could you say one sentence without the word "fuck" in it?
Sorry. Would you like a Pez?
No.
Best fucking candy in the world!
I'm tired of being told I'm crazy. Tonight I will be the least crazy of all of you!
So, you have come to see the crazy old man?
Yes.
At least this one is honest.
Dar Jeeling?
Ceylon.
Someone else has to know.
Why not you?
Because I'm not going to be here.
Lars, just let him die.
Did you ever wonder if you had the dreams because we told you the stories, or if we told you the stories to explain your dreams?
You have that Fundraiser.
Tell me I can get out of it.
You can't get out of it.
Tell me I don't have to go.
You have to go.
Isn't this the point where someone says "There's got to be a reasonable explanation for all this"?
What are you doing, Martin?
MARTIN'S DOING THIS!
[throws him into the furniture]
He looked like he'd been on a three-week bender.
The Runestone will offer you many things, you must not listen!
[Demonic whispering]
What do you want?
It's always good to be on first-name terms with Evil.
Are you okay?

[nods]
No.
